Primitive.name: parseProc
Primitive.description: Process of the distributed system, each letter is an event, ';' means next process, alphabetical position of the letter is relevant for happend-before relationship

Primitive.name: parseMessage
Primitive.description: Message between two events, form eventName1eventName2, use ',' as separator for messages, messages can only be send from earlier to later

Primitive.name: radius
Primitive.description: Radius of shown circles, governs size of the animation

Primitive.name: highlightColor
Primitive.description: highlight color for current event and messages

Primitive.name: highlightContext
Primitive.description: color for highlighting the context in the source code
